Package networkHandler

Class BetweennessCentralityMeasureList

  • java.lang.Object
    • networkHandler.BetweennessCentralityMeasureList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, GraphProperty<java.util.ArrayList<BetweennessCentralityMeasure>>
    public class BetweennessCentralityMeasureList
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphProperty<java.util.ArrayList<BetweennessCentralityMeasure>>

    This class is responsible for managing calculations of a single or multiple BetweennessCentralityMeasures of a given Graph. In case of multiple calculations, separate Threads are used for efficiency.

    It handles three different cases of calculation:

    1.: All BetweennessCentralityMeasures of a given graph are calculated.

    2.: Only a singleBetweennessCentralityMeasureValue for a given singleCalculationNodeId is calculated.

    3.: A combination of case 1 and 2. First all BetweennessCentralityMeasures are calculated and afterwards a singleBetweennessCentralityMeasureValue is referenced separately.

    To differ between these cases multiple constructors are implemented for ease of use.

    Author:
    Fabian Grun
    See Also:
    BetweennessCentralityMeasure, GraphProperty

      • getSingleBetweennessCentralityMeasure

        public BetweennessCentralityMeasure getSingleBetweennessCentralityMeasure()

      • run

        public void run()

        Method responsible for the actual calculation of the property value(s).

        The method first checks whether a full list of BetweennessCentralityMeasures needs to be calculated or only a singleBetweennessCentralityMeasureValue.

        Afterwards it creates and starts separate Threads for the separate BetweennessCentralityMeasures and waits until they are all finished before terminating.

        Specified by:
        run in interface GraphProperty<java.util.ArrayList<BetweennessCentralityMeasure>>
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • printToConsole

        public void printToConsole()

        Method for printing the calculated result(s) as a message to the console.

        Calls the BetweennessCentralityMeasure.printToConsole() method of all managed BetweennessCentralityMeasures.

        Specified by:
        printToConsole in interface GraphProperty<java.util.ArrayList<BetweennessCentralityMeasure>>
